FDG.function_description: QQ main interface: chat, contacts, moments

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic starts on the QQ main interface (page 0). The user clicks the Moments tab (action at [0,5]), which remains on the same page (page 0) to access the Moments section. There are no branches or loops as this is a single action to navigate to the Moments tab.

steps.summary: Click on the Moments tab to navigate to the Moments section (staying on page 0)

FDG.function_description: This page allows the user to set or change their QQ online status (e.g., online, busy, invisible) and view the number of friends who have set a status, with options for custom statuses and account switching.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 0 and clicks the user profile & status area (action S1) to open the status panel (page 1). Then, the user can click the 'Close status panel (X)' button (action S2) to return to page 0. There are no branches or loops as the flow is a simple open-and-close cycle for the status panel.

steps.summary: Open status panel by clicking user profile & status area
Close status panel by clicking 'Close status panel (X)' button

FDG.function_description: This page is a pop - up menu triggered by the “Add” button on the QQ main interface. It provides functions such as creating a group chat, creating a channel, adding friends or groups, scanning, transferring files, and making payments and collections.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the 'Add' button (plus icon) on the QQ main interface. This action triggers a pop - up menu that provides various functions such as creating a group chat, creating a channel, adding friends or groups, scanning, transferring files, and making payments and collections. There are no further branches or loops as the main action is to open this menu.

steps.summary: Click the 'Add' button (plus icon) to open the pop - up menu with various functions.

FDG.function_description: Search contacts/chats input

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 0. The user inputs '好友名字' into the search contacts/chats input field, which leads to page 3. There are no branches or loops as this is a single input action.

steps.summary: Input '好友名字' into the search field

FDG.function_description: The "动态" (Moments) page in QQ allows users to view and interact with "空间动态" (Qzone Moments), with a search bar for finding specific content and a bottom navigation to switch between Messages, Contacts, and Moments.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the '动态' (Moments) page. They can click the 'Messages' tab in the bottom navigation to switch to the Messages page, with the flow remaining on the same page initially before the click action.

steps.summary: Click the Messages tab in bottom navigation

FDG.function_description: The current page (QQ Contacts) enables users to view, search, and manage their QQ friends, check friend online statuses, access new friend requests, group notifications, and different contact categories (groups, friends, group chats, channels, devices).

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the '动态' (Dynamic) page. First, they click the '联系人' (Contacts) tab to navigate to the Contacts page. Then, on the Contacts page, they click the '好友' (Friends) tab to view the list of QQ friends, along with their online statuses. The flow is a straight line with no branches or loops.

steps.summary: Click '联系人' (Contacts) tab to navigate to Contacts page
Click '好友' (Friends) tab to view QQ friends list

FDG.function_description: Status option '忙碌'
data_out: user status set to 忙碌

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic starts on page 1, where the user clicks the '忙碌' (Busy) status option. This action transitions the app to page 5, completing the selection of the '忙碌' status.

steps.summary: Click the '忙碌' (Busy) status option

FDG.function_description: This page allows the user to manage their QQ online status by selecting from various predefined status options (e.g., online, busy, invisible) or creating a custom status, and also provides an option to switch QQ accounts.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the QQ status management page. They can choose to click the 'Switch account' option to initiate the account switching process. Since there's only one action here, the flow is a single step with no branches or loops.

steps.summary: Click the 'Switch account' option to start switching QQ accounts

FDG.function_description: 联系人搜索框

core_logic.logic: The process starts on the contacts page (page 4). The user inputs 'test' into the contact search box, which likely triggers a search and navigates to a new page (page 6) to display relevant results. There are no branching or looping steps here as it's a single input action leading to a result page.

steps.summary: Input 'test' into the contact search box

FDG.function_description: The "新朋友" (New Friends) page in QQ provides options to invite WeChat friends, match with like - minded strangers, explore nearby updates, and share one's QQ QR code, facilitating the process of making new friends.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the '新朋友' (New Friends) entry on the contacts page to enter the New Friends page. From there, the user can either navigate back to the contacts page using the back arrow or close the sync section (though the latter’s purpose in the friend - making context is less clear from the current actions).

steps.summary: Click on the '新朋友' entry to enter the New Friends page
Click the back navigation arrow to return to the contacts page
Click to close the sync section

FDG.function_description: This page displays the detailed profile information of the QQ friend "test", including QQ number, online status, various badges, signature, profile completion, and provides options to view/modify profile, send messages, and access QQ space.

core_logic.logic: The process starts on the contacts page (page 4). First, click on the friend 'test' entry to navigate to the detailed profile page (page 8). From the profile page, clicking the back button returns to the contacts page (page 4), completing the flow.

steps.summary: Click on the friend 'test' entry to open the detailed profile page.
Click the back button to return to the contacts page.

FDG.function_description: This page in QQ provides multiple methods (such as searching by QQ number, using mobile contacts, scanning, face - to - face addition, conditional search, etc.) to help users find and add new QQ friends or groups.
data_out: 进入添加联系人功能页面

core_logic.logic: The process starts by clicking the '添加联系人图标' to enter the friend-finding page. From there, the user can either input a QQ number in the search box, clear the input, cancel the search, or return to the previous page. The main flow involves navigating to the friend-finding interface and then choosing to search, clear input, cancel, or go back.

steps.summary: Click the '添加联系人图标' to enter the friend-finding page.
Click the '返回按钮' to go back to the previous page.
Input '123456789' in the search input box.
Click the '取消按钮' to cancel the search and return to the friend-finding page.
Click the '清除输入内容按钮' to clear the input content.

FDG.function_description: This page provides multiple methods (search by account/number, phone contacts, scan, face - to - face, conditional search, nearby people, etc.) to help users find and add QQ friends or groups.

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 7 (New Friends). The user clicks the 'Add friend' button (action_ref [7,1]), which navigates to page 9. On page 9, multiple friend/group addition methods (search, phone contacts, scan, face - to - face, conditional search, nearby people, etc.) are available for the user to choose from to find and add QQ friends or groups.

steps.summary: Click the 'Add friend' button on the 'New Friends' page to navigate to the page with multiple friend - adding methods.

FDG.function_description: This page in QQ's "New Friends" section provides options to invite WeChat friends, match with like - minded strangers, explore nearby events, and share one's QQ QR code for the purpose of managing and adding new friends.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on the 'New Friends' page (page 7). The user can perform a click action to enable contact sync, which remains on the same page (page 7) after the action. There are no branches or loops as only one action is defined here.

steps.summary: Click to enable contact sync

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to select an existing chat to continue conversations or start a new chat, with options to search for chats and manage multiple chats.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 7. They perform a click action to invite WeChat friends, which navigates to page 11. This is a single-step flow with no branches or loops, focusing on initiating the WeChat friend invitation process.

steps.summary: Click to invite WeChat friends

FDG.function_description: 切换在线状态

core_logic.logic: 用户在页面8点击“切换在线状态”按钮，触发状态切换，页面跳转到28。

steps.summary: 点击“切换在线状态”按钮

FDG.function_description: 点赞按钮

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic for the like button functional point is a single step: click the like button located on the page (page index 8). This action transitions to the destination page (page index 29), completing the like operation.

steps.summary: Click the like button

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to view and edit their QQ personal profile information, including nickname, cover, signature, gender, age, birthday, location, interest tags, and selected photos, with options to modify each detail.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 8 (QQ profile page) and clicks the '编辑资料' (Edit Profile) button. This action navigates to page 30, where the user can view and edit personal profile details like nickname, cover, signature, and more. The flow is a straight line from clicking the edit button to entering the profile editing page, with no branches or loops in this initial step.

steps.summary: Click the '编辑资料' (Edit Profile) button to navigate to the profile editing page.

FDG.function_description: This page is a QQ chat interface for the friend "test", allowing users to send messages, use voice input, send emojis, and access additional chat - related functions.
data_out: chat text input box (with text entered)

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the '发消息' button to enter the chat interface. Then, text is input into the chat text box. Finally, the user can choose to click the back button to return to the previous page, completing the core chat-related actions.

steps.summary: Click the '发消息' button to enter the chat interface
Input 'hello' into the chat text input box
Click the back button to return to the previous page

FDG.function_description: This page is the QQ personal profile settings interface, allowing users to configure display - related options such as super QQ show display, mini nest, super QQ show background customization, profile display settings, and nickname color settings.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 8 (personal profile). First, the user clicks the settings icon (action S1) to navigate to page 32 (settings interface). Then, the user can click the back arrow (action S2) to return to the personal profile page (page 8). There are no branches as the actions are a simple navigation to settings and back.

steps.summary: Click the settings icon to enter the settings page
Click the back arrow to return to the personal profile page

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to search for and browse QQ groups (categorized by topics like games, anime, etc.) to join, with options to search by group ID/name and view group details/status (e.g., joinable, pending verification).
data_out: 更新后的加群原因输入内容
更新后的进群介绍输入框内容
更新的入群介绍卡设置

core_logic.logic: The user starts by clicking the '找群' (Find Group) tab. Then, they can either search for a group by name/ID in the search box, browse groups by category (e.g., '游戏' for games), or click to join a specific group. If joining a group, they may enter a reason and introduction, and then send the join request. Some steps like viewing more effects or selecting a membership card are optional and repeatable.

steps.summary: Click '找群' tab to enter group search page
Input group name/ID in search box
Click '游戏' category to browse game-related groups
Click '加入' button for a specific group
Click link to search related groups
Input join group reason
Input group introduction
Click to view more effects (repeatable)
Click '发送申请' to send join request
Select super membership card option

FDG.function_description: This page in the QQ app displays the mobile phone contact list (labeled "手机通讯录") to check for contacts that can be matched (to add as QQ friends), and currently shows a message indicating there are no matching contacts ("没有可匹配的通讯录").

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 9. First, the '手机联系人' (Mobile Contacts) button is clicked, navigating to page 14. On page 14, the UI shows a message indicating no matching contacts. Then, the back arrow button is clicked to return to page 9.

steps.summary: Click the '手机联系人' button to navigate to the mobile contacts page.
Click the back arrow button to return to the previous page.

FDG.function_description: This page in QQ displays search results for the query "123456789", categorizing results into users and group chats, and provides options to add users or join groups.

core_logic.logic: On the page with the search query '123456789', the user clicks the button to view search results. This action navigates to a new page that displays search results categorized into users and group chats, with options to add users or join groups.

steps.summary: Click the button to view search results for '123456789'.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to edit their QQ nickname, with a text input field to modify the nickname and a "完成" (Complete) button to save the changes, along with a character count indicator (4/36) and a clear (×) option for the input.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 30 and clicks the nickname edit option to enter the nickname editing page (33). On page 33, the user inputs a new nickname in the text field. Then, the user can choose to click the 'Complete' button to save the changes and return to the previous page (30), or potentially take other actions, but the core flow involves editing and saving the nickname.

steps.summary: Click nickname edit option to enter edit page
Input new nickname in text field
Click 'Complete' button to save and return

FDG.function_description: 语音录制按钮

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 31. They click the voice recording button (action_ref [31,1]), which navigates to page 36. This is a straight - line flow with no branches or loops.

steps.summary: Click the voice recording button to navigate to page 36

FDG.function_description: This page functions as the emoji selection interface within the QQ chat window for the contact "test", allowing users to browse and select various emojis (including recently used, super emojis, and yellow - faced emojis) to send in the chat, and also provides other input - related function buttons like voice input, text input, and more.

core_logic.logic: The process starts on the chat page for contact 'test'. First, the emoji selection button is clicked to open the emoji interface. Then, a recently used big smiley emoji is clicked to select it for sending in the chat.

steps.summary: Click the emoji selection button to open the emoji interface
Click the recently used big smiley emoji to select it

FDG.function_description: This page is the chat interface with friend "test" in QQ, providing options for sending various types of content (photos, location, files, etc.) and additional interactive features (like "戳一戳") to enhance the chat experience.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on the QQ chat page with friend 'test'. The user clicks the '更多功能' (more features) button, which opens a menu with options like sending photos, location, files, or using '戳一戳' (poke) to enhance the chat experience.

steps.summary: Click the '更多功能' button to open the additional features menu.

FDG.function_description: This page is the chat interface's more - function section for the friend "test", enabling users to send various types of content (like photos, location, files) and use features (such as collection, poke) during the chat.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the chat page with friend 'test'. They click the chat menu button (the '+' icon at the bottom right, which expands to show more options). This action opens the menu with various chat-related features like sending photos, location, files, or using collection/poke.

steps.summary: Click the chat menu button (the '+' icon) to open the chat feature menu.

FDG.function_description: 展示超级QQ秀 toggle
data_out: 展示超级QQ秀设置状态更新

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 32 (settings page). The user clicks the '展示超级QQ秀' toggle, which leads to page 41. This action toggles the state of the '展示超级QQ秀' option (e.g., from on to off or vice versa) as part of the app's settings for QQ Show display.

steps.summary: Click the '展示超级QQ秀' toggle to change its state (e.g., on/off) and navigate to page 41.

FDG.function_description: 迷你窝 toggle

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 32 (settings page). The user clicks the '迷你窝' toggle switch, which is initially in the off (gray) state. This action toggles the switch's state, likely enabling or disabling the 迷你窝 feature, and navigates to page 42 (presumably reflecting the updated state).

steps.summary: Click the '迷你窝' toggle switch to change its state and navigate to the updated page.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to edit the background of their Super QQ Show by selecting from preset background images, taking a photo in the "小窝" (mini nest), or uploading an image from the album, and then confirming the selection to apply the background.
data_out: 选中的粉色星月背景图
更新后的超级QQ秀背景设置

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 32 and clicks to enter the Super QQ Show background customization page. On the background editing page (page 43), the user can choose a preset background (like the pink moon-star design), take a photo in the mini nest, or upload from the album. After selecting a background (e.g., a preset image or via album/upload), the user confirms the selection to apply it, or can return to the previous page.

steps.summary: Click to enter Super QQ Show background customization
Select preset background (pink moon-star)
Click to upload from album
Select media source (e.g., recent photos)
Confirm background selection to apply
Return to previous page

FDG.function_description: This page, titled "资料展示设置" (Profile Display Settings), allows users to configure the visibility (e.g., visible to everyone, not visible to anyone) of various personal profile details (like gender, age, company, etc.) and manage the display of additional content (e.g., QQ level and membership) on their QQ profile card.
data_out: 资料展示设置页面内容

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the settings page (page 32). They click the '资料展示设置' (Profile Display Settings) button, which navigates to the Profile Display Settings page (page 44) where various profile details and display options can be configured. No branches or loops are present in this initial flow as only one action is provided.

steps.summary: Click the '资料展示设置' button to navigate to the profile display settings page.

FDG.function_description: This page provides a温馨提示 (warm reminder) about the current concise mode, informing the user that decorations are not displayed in this mode and offering options to either acknowledge the message or switch to the normal mode, while also being part of the QQ colorful nickname privilege settings where users can learn about and potentially activate the colorful nickname feature (with a note about membership requirements and mode switching for proper display).
data_out: 彩色昵称特权页面加载

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 32 and clicks the '昵称颜色设置' button to navigate to page 45. On page 45, the user can choose to click the '我知道了' button to acknowledge the reminder and proceed, which is the only branch here.

steps.summary: Click '昵称颜色设置' button to go to the next page
Click '我知道了' button to acknowledge and finish

FDG.function_description: 群聊加入按钮

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic starts on page 15. The user clicks the '群聊加入按钮' (group chat join button) at the specified position. Since there are no further branches or loops indicated by the provided action, this is a single-step flow focused on initiating the group chat join action.

FDG.function_description: This page provides a preview of the exclusive introduction card's display effect in the group chat when the user joins the QQ group, showing how the special effect will be presented to group members.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the group application page. First, they click the '预览效果' (Preview Effect) button to open the preview modal for the exclusive introduction card. Then, they can click the 'Close preview modal button (X)' to exit the preview and return to the previous page.

Click the 'Close preview modal button (X)' to exit the preview

FDG.function_description: This page provides a preview of the exclusive introduction card's display effect in the group chat after joining the QQ group, showing how the special effect will be presented to group members.

core_logic.logic: On the QQ group application page, the user clicks the 'Preview Effect' button for the exclusive introduction card. This action opens a preview window that shows how the special effect of the introduction card will be displayed to group members in the chat, completing the preview process.

steps.summary: Click the 'Preview Effect' button to view how the exclusive introduction card's special effect will appear in the group chat.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to edit the background for Super QQ Show, allowing selection from preset backgrounds, adding from the album, or initiating a "go to nest shoot" action to customize the background.

steps.summary: Click the '去小窝拍' button to start the nest shooting process for background customization.

FDG.function_description: This page allows the user to set the visibility (e.g., visible to everyone, only friends, or no one) of the "gender" basic information item within QQ's profile display settings.

资料可见性设置（所有人可见）
资料可见性设置（仅好友可见）
profile visibility setting (updated to 所有人不可见)

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the profile display settings page (page 44) and clicks the '性别' (gender) visibility setting item to enter the visibility options page (page 51). At this point, a branch point appears: the user can choose to set the visibility to '所有人可见' (visible to everyone), '仅好友可见' (visible to friends only), '所有人不可见' (invisible to everyone), or cancel the operation, each leading to a different page (53, 54, 55, or 56 respectively).

steps.summary: Click the '性别' (gender) visibility setting item to open the visibility options page.
Click '所有人可见' (visible to everyone) to set gender visibility to everyone.
Click '仅好友可见' (visible to friends only) to set gender visibility to friends only.
Click '所有人不可见' (invisible to everyone) to set gender visibility to no one.
Click '取消' (cancel) to abort the visibility setting change.

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to fill in an optional reason for joining a QQ group and an optional introduction message, select a personalized introduction card and entry effect (with some options for VIP/Super VIP members), and then send a group - joining application.

FDG.function_description: This page is for loading into the QQ "小窝" (mini nest) virtual space, allowing users to enter and explore the personalized virtual environment after the loading process completes.

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to select and apply a background image for their Super QQ Show, with options to choose from preset backgrounds, take a photo in the virtual room, or add a custom background from their photo album.

FDG.function_description: 本地视频 media source option

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 49. The user clicks on the '本地视频' (Local Video) media source option, which navigates to page 50. There are no branches or loops as this is a single action.

steps.summary: Click on '本地视频' media source option
